I get my exercise by working on the farm.
I'm afraid of disappointing my family.
i sing many songs.
i write fiction for fun.
i am a personal chef.

participant_2.background:
I'm glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer.
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i am a student.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

content.text: The weather is getting warmer, so I'm glad I'm a personal chef, so I can get some exercise. What do you do for fun?
I'm a student, but I also work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
That's awesome! I used to want to be an actress when I was younger. What's your favorite role you've ever played?
I don't have a favorite role yet, but I'm really excited for my upcoming role in a new play. It's a really challenging role, but I'm up for the challenge.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do a great job. What do you like to do for fun on your days off?
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks. I also love to walk my dogs in the park.
That sounds like fun! I like to write fiction for fun. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
That's awesome! I love to write too. I used to write a lot of poetry when I was younger.
That's great! I'm glad to meet someone who shares my love of writing.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who understands the creative process.
